item.Q:
Write the character:
(experienced action marker); to cross; to go over; to pass (time); to celebrate (a holiday); to live; to get along; excessively; too-; surname
item.A:
traditional: 過
guò
过程 (過程) guòchéng course of events; process

item.Q:
Write the character:
day; sky; heaven
item.A:
tiān
今天 jīntiān today; at the present; now

item.Q:
Write the character:
to think; to believe; to suppose; to wish; to want; to miss
item.A:
xiǎng
思想 sīxiǎng thought; thinking; idea

item.Q:
Write the character:
and; as well as; but (not); yet (not); (shows causal relation); (shows change of state); (shows contrast)
item.A:
ér
而且 érqiě not only ... but also; as well as; moreover; in addition; furthermore

item.Q:
Write the character:
back; behind; rear; afterwards; after; later
item.A:
traditional: 後
hòu
以后 (以後) yǐhòu after; later; afterwards; following; later on; in the future

item.Q:
Write the character:
heart; mind
item.A:
xīn
中心 zhōngxīn center; heart; core

item.Q:
Write the character:
to go; to leave; to remove; fourth tone of putonghua
item.A:
qù
去年 qùnián last year

item.Q:
Write the character:
(adverb of degree); quite; very; awfully
item.A: hěn

item.Q:
Write the character:
finish; complete; accomplish; become; turn into; win; succeed; one tenth; surname
item.A:
chéng
形成 xíngchéng to form; to take shape

item.Q:
Write the character:
to send out; to show (one's feeling); to issue; to develop; (classifier for gunshots, "rounds")
item.A:
traditional: 發
fā
发展 (發展) fāzhǎn development; growth; to develop; to grow; to expand
